meanings.definition: A class of organic compounds containing multiple conjugated double bonds.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the polyene under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The polyene is commonly used in the production of certain medications.
meanings.sent3: The polyene walked into the lab and asked for a double bond.
meanings.sent4: Her love for chemistry was like a polyene, with many connections and bonds.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the polyene structure fascinated the students.

meanings.definition: Any compound containing a series of alternating single and double bonds.
meanings.sent1: We learned about the polyene in our chemistry class.
meanings.sent2: The polyene in the reaction mixture was crucial for the experiment's success.
meanings.sent3: The polyene and the double bond went on a date to the laboratory.
meanings.sent4: His arguments were like a polyene, weaving in and out of logic.
meanings.sent5: The unique structure of the polyene made it stand out among other compounds.
